message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. It's a unique opportunity to own something truly valuable. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to you is $1000000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe that's a fair price considering its value to me is $1000000

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1050000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you is $1000000. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $1000000. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me is $1000000

I understand your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to make another concession and offer it to you for $1025000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you is $1000000. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not willing to go above $980000. I'm willing to meet you halfway on the previous offer, so I'll offer $1012500. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me is $1000000

I understand your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as high as $1012500. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $1075000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you is $1000000. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not willing to go above $990000. I'm willing to meet you halfway on the previous offer, so I'll offer $1027500. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me is $1000000

I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $1100000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you is $1000000. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not willing to go above $995000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me is $1000000. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $1000000
